resources.string: What is a beauty app? what are the services provided? \n
Do you know the importance of beauty in our lives?

BEAUTY is an app that sells beauty products and contains three product categories: Skincare, Makeup, and Hair. In addition, you can see a short video about the importance of beauty.\n Contact us if you need any help.
